item.title: Commonly used resources
item.description: This page has some commonly used resources for the class Link to data sources snr-r-group/data/ Guide to good and reproducible code BES Guide to reproducible code Google’s R Style Guide Hadley Wickham’s Style Guide Accessibility, reusability, reliability: Improving the standards for publishing code in Methods in Ecology and Evolution Authors formatR Cheat sheets Tidyverse, ggplot2, Rstudio, and more
